title: Grants personal income taxpayers with a credit of $1.00 per day for each day after April 1 until the legislature enacts the state budget
summary: Grants personal income taxpayers with a credit of $1.00 per day for each day up to a maximum of seventy-five days after April 1 until the legislature enacts the state budget provided such taxpayer has timely filed his or her return.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing for a personal income tax credit in the event of a tardy state budget
